WASHINGTON , Mich. -- [ARG0: President Donald Trump] took a post - rally victory lap Sunday morning on his favorite social media platform , Twitter , but not without [ARGM-ADV: also] [V: taking] [ARG1: a dig] [ARG2: at a favorite target , the media , and its annual dinner celebration in Washington] .
